title: Parenting When the Family Is Locked Inside
description: The clinical psychologist Lisa Damour discusses the specific challenges of raising children during the pandemic, and Dwight Garner asks Pamela Paul about putting together the Book Review.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
